entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0040 (Add accessibility modifiers) is not enforced for types nested in interfaces #74245
  • 'dotnet_style_require_accessibility_modifiers = always' doesn't work for interface members #74244
  • Duplicate item metadata present in generated editorconfig with CompilerVisibleItemMetadata #74234

Closed

  • New Document outline in VS2022 17.4 - font too small #72172
  • Generate a class or type in Visual Studio 2019 #72209
  • VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider: occuring error messsage for tuple contruct #72486
  • Rename class property changes all occurrences of property name in all comments in project. #73453
  • Prepend $(NoWarn) to list analyzer rule generates a false positive. #74087
  • Partial properties needs to enforce that all implementation part accessors have bodies #74221
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35101.127 #74230

PullRequests

Created

  • Move settings updates into a queue. #74249
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid recreating stateset objects continually. #74246
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Fix ID for telemetry logging in on the fly docs #74237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Editor color scheme is visible but disabled when unsupported theme is selected #74236
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks: IdeAnalyzerOptions #74235
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch implicit span to conversion from type #74232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • skip default value assignment #74231
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74248
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve performance of expensive operation #74247
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix oop syncing #74240
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to LanguageVersion.CSharp13 now that the compiler has added this api. #74242
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2487009 #74241
    auto-merge
  • Remove some vestiges of the old solution crawler. #74239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove obsolete service #74238
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make project system workspace transformation functions resilient to being attempted twice #74189
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Set intermediate path sooner #74229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove fallback options for SimplifierOptions #74222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ignore user-defined Span conversions #74002
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 13 #74215
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Report a diagnostic on missing body in partial property implementation #74224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Partial Properties, Next

Updated

  • Dispose various locations using PEReader #74226
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • New generator apis #74127
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged
  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • 17.11: Add weak heuristics in our designer scanning code to improve experience during things like configuration switch. #74152
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Syntax formatting options #74223
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename the record parameter when its property get renamed #74168
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Display lifted primary constructor parameters in watch window … #74188
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Persist the user's choice in ExtractClass and ExtractInterface. #74065
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add tests for consuming instance extension methods from VB and previous version of C# compiler. #74182
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Escape `record` keywords #74227
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove fallbacks - 1 of n #74041
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Address PR feedback on https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/74132 #74193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
